verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2298>marvellous<s%>, <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4127>plagues<s%>, which are the <S%G2078>last<s%>, <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> is <S%G5055>finished<s%> the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> as it <S%G5613>were<s%> a <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5193>glass<s%> <S%G3396>mingled<s%> with <S%G4442>fire<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> them that come off <S%G3528>victorious<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1504>image<s%>, and <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>, <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1909>by<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5193>glass<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2788>harps<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Who <S%G5101><s%> <S%G5399>shall<s%> <S%G3364>not<s%> <S%G5399>fear<s%>, <S%G4571><s%> O <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>? <S%G3754>for<s%> thou <S%G3441>only<s%> art <S%G3741>holy<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> shall <S%G2240>come<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> righteous <S%G1345>acts<s%> have been made <S%G5319>manifest<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%>, and2532, Proverbs0 the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of the <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%G3142>testimony<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> was <S%G455>opened<s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> living <S%G2226>creatures<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> unto the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G5357>bowls<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, who <S%G2198>liveth<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> was <S%G1072>filled<s%> with <S%G2586>smoke<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> was <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%>, <S%G891>till<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4127>plagues<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> should be <S%G5055>finished<s%>.
